title: Cohesity deepens Google Cloud tie-up for AI and cyber-resilience
description: Cohesity is strengthening its partnership with Google Cloud, expanding its data protection portfolio, widening its AI capabilities, and adding new data sovereignty and cybersecurity features. The companies announced an initial batch of enhancements in April, integrating Cohesity’s Gaia GenAI search assistant with Google’s Gemini models and Agentspace, tapping Google Threat Intelligence, and working with Mandiant [...]
